title: FS: T206 Green Cobb SGC 40 - No longer for sale

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Green Cobb SGC 40 - No longer for sale
posts.post_content:
Card is no longer available.  Always looking for T202 Cobbs in trade.  "I'll take it" supersedes negotiations.  Nice solid card - satisfaction guaranteed.  Please email to 
 [url]jwondowski@aol.com[/url].  Thank you.

John Wondowski

[quote name="wondo" post=1715352]Price is $4900 net to me - I'll pick up shipping.  Always looking for T202 Cobbs in trade.  "I'll take it" supersedes negotiations.  Nice solid card - satisfaction guaranteed.  Please email to [url]jwondowski@aol.com[/url].  Thank you.

John Wondowski[/QUOTE]

Nice card good luck with sale
Bump for price reduction $4750 net to me

$4400 or best offer


Thank you,

John
